paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a KCNH2 variant of uncertain significance found in a patient with Torsades De Pointes.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Electrical storm of Torsades De Pointes
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Our patient's genetic report showed, a variant of uncertain significant of KCNH2 gene with heterozygous nucleic acid change C.1756 C<G and p.Leu586Val amino acid alteration that has an autosomal dominant inheritance pattern.

functional_data.summary: The variant is likely causative due to its effect on potassium channel structure.

variants.additional_notes: The variant has not been previously reported.
key_quotes: the specific one found in our patient was never reported.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly described in the text.
